column4: why can't I find this package in my Ubuntu ?? http://packages.ubuntulinux.org/dapper/net/nepenthes ?
ok, so the package is only in dapper, I have to wait until it's realeased or can I start using it already by changing my apt-sources ?
you could possibly backport the package, or you could upgrade to dapper (I have not done that yet so can't speak to stability), or you could wait
